clickToagree: By clicking "Continue", you agree to the
missYou: We will miss you, {{username}}, rather come back!
weWillEsport: We will take esports for amateurs to the next level.
inYourFreeTimeDesc: We have a large number of tournaments and you can choose a convenient time for yourself.
getPrizesDesc: In absolutely every tournament, we give prizes for winners and participants.
winAndStrongerDesc: The more you participate in tournaments, the more experience you will get back and the stronger you will become.
joinCommunityDesc: Join forces and invest in our shared vision for an unforgettable gaming experience.
